metadata.title: CVE-2024-38631 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: iio:adc: PAC1934: fix accessing out of bounds array index Fix accessing out ofbounds array index for average current and voltage measurements. The deviceitself has only 4 channels, but in sysfs there are "fake" channels for theaverage voltages and currents too.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
